name: Body
description: Main body of application in which all other components exist.

sub.name: Toolbar
sub.description: Small toolbar across the top with

sub.name: WorkspaceSearchBar
sub.description: An input box that allows user to search entire workspace.

sub.name: LogoutButton
sub.description: A button for logging out.

sub.name: WorkspaceNavigationToolbar
sub.description: A component that allows users to switch between different workspaces they are a part of. It provides an overview of the existing workspaces and facilitates quick navigation between them.
sub.location: Located on the left side in a narrow strip.

sub.name: WorkspaceIcon
sub.description: Clickable Icon for the current workspace.

sub.name: WorkspaceHomeIcon
sub.description: Navigation icon that takes user to the workspace homepage.
user_interactions: clicking makes icon selected and takes user to workspace home.

sub.name: CreateNewButton
sub.description: Clickable plus sign button that reveals dropdown menu that allows users to create new Messages, channels, and workspaces.

sub.name: UserIcon
sub.description: Icon button for the logged in user. Displays their avatar if they have one and a generic user icon if not.

sub.name: ChatsSidebar
sub.description: Sidebar menu containing ChannelList and DirectMessagesList
sub.location: Left of page after the WorkspaceNavigationToolbar

sub.name: ChannelList
sub.description: Displays a list of all channels the user has access to within a selected workspace. This includes public channels and private channels
websocket_events: When a new channel is created in the workspace, the channel appears in the list.
When a channel recieves a message that channel's status in the ChannelList moves from unread to read.

sub.name: Channel Header
sub.description: label at the top of channel list that says 'Channels'

sub.name: ChannelHeaderChevron
sub.description: chevron that expands and collapses channel list.
sub.location: Far left side of channel header.
user_interactions: click expands and collapses channel list.

sub.name: ChannelDropdown
sub.description: Button that contains the 'Channel' header text and expands a dropdown options menu on click.

sub.name: ChannelItem
sub.description: List item for a channel in ChannelList.

sub.name: DirectMessagesList
sub.description: Shows a list of ongoing direct message conversations with other users. This is crucial for one-on-one communication outside of channels.

sub.name: DM List Header
sub.description: The top section of the direct messages list, providing options for sorting and managing direct message interactions.
sub.location: At the top of the Direct Messages List component.

sub.name: DM Header Sorting Controls
sub.description: Controls for sorting DMs in different orders such as by latest or frequently contacted.
sub.location: Located within the DM List Header.

sub.name: DM Notification Icon
sub.description: Icon indicating unread messages or notifications within a DM Entry.
sub.location: Overlaying the DM Entry, typically on the right side.

sub.name: DM Entry
sub.description: Individual entry within the direct messages list, representing a conversation with another user or group.
sub.location: Within the main body of the Direct Messages List component.
user_interactions: Opens DM conversation on name click.
Displays tooltip on user avatar hover.

sub.name: New DM Button
sub.description: A button for starting a new direct message conversation by selecting one or multiple users.
sub.location: Typically found at the top or bottom of the Direct Messages List.
user_interactions: Opens a new DM overlay for creating conversations.

sub.name: ChatArea
sub.description: The main area where a chat is displayed. Either a channel or a DM.

sub.name: MessageInput
user_interactions: User inputs text, emojis and attaches files for sending to chat.

sub.name: ChannelHeader
sub.description: contains channel name

sub.name: Message Display Area
sub.description: The main section where messages sent within a channel or direct message are displayed, including text and media.
sub.location: Centrally located within the Chat Area parent component.

sub.name: Message
sub.description: An individual message in a ChatArea
sub.location: Listed in order in chat area. newest on bottom.
user_interactions: hovering causes message to become highlighted

sub.name: UserIcon
sub.description: The icon of the user who sent the message.
user_interactions: hovering causes UserInfoTooltip to appear above icon.
hovering causes MessageToolbar to appear on message.

sub.name: ThreadViewer
sub.description: A side panel that opens on the right when a user opens a thread.
